sentences.en: A linear transformation on Milbert space is called compact ( also completely continuous ).
sentences.cn: 希尔伯特空间上的线性变换叫做紧的 ( 也叫全连续的 ).
琼脂糖是一种天然的直链多糖.

sentences.en: Every basis of a linear space contains the same number of vectors.
sentences.cn: 一线性空间的每一基底包含同样数目的向量.

sentences.en: Graphite and even its linear counterpart, poly ( p - phenylene ) are too insoluble.
sentences.cn: 石墨甚至其线性类似物, 聚 ( 名聚-苯撑 ) 都是极难溶解的.

sentences.en: Growth can be represented by a linear or log linear trend.
sentences.cn: 增长可以用线性或对数线性趋势来表示.

sentences.en: Here are linear measures in millimeters.
sentences.cn: 这是毫米方式的线性量度.

sentences.en: In his art he broke the laws of scientific linear perspective.
sentences.cn: 他在自己的绘画艺术中打破了科学的直线透视法规律。

sentences.en: In linear theory there is no difference between Eulerian and Lagrangian descriptions.
sentences.cn: 在线性理论中,欧勒描述和拉格朗日描述之间是没什么不同的.

sentences.en: It is unlikely that the effects of friction are linear with load.
sentences.cn: 摩擦效应与载荷未见得能成线性关系.

sentences.en: Oscillatory system can be broadly characterized as linear or nonlinear.
sentences.cn: 振荡系统可大致上区分为线性和非线性两种.

sentences.en: Such steps mean the simultaneous solution of either two linear equations.
sentences.cn: 这样的步骤意味着同时求解两个线性方程.

sentences.en: The body of a neuron. Acts approximately as a linear threshold element.
sentences.cn: 神经元的本体, 其作用近似于一种线性阀值器件.

sentences.en: The linear glucan molecules of cellulose are bound together by hydrogen bonds.
sentences.cn: 纤维素中直链葡聚糖分子由氢键连接在一起.

sentences.en: The ordinate scale is linear in decibels.
sentences.cn: 纵坐标比例尺以分贝为单位是线性的.

sentences.en: To illustrate the foregoing analysis, consider a linear elestic solid.
sentences.cn: 为了举例阐明以上的分析, 我们考虑一种线性的弹性固体.

trans.tran_en: consisting of lines, or in the form of a straight line
